html:
Creative Practice Essentials

This module will introduce you to a series of workshops in; drawing, research skills, bookmaking, experimentation with traditional media and digital skills. The skills gained during this module will enable you to gain practical art and design knowledge that will facilitate you to explore personal ideas and study on the undergraduate programme with a greater confidence and creativity.

This is a foundation module, intended to prepare you for specialist study on the specialist Contemporary Creative Practices Programme (CCP). Teaching exercises will support you to develop a solid framework of knowledge and practical skills, as well as a critical approach to visual communication and image-making using traditional and digital approaches, techniques and media.

Module Outcomes:

+  Conduct research that challenges preconceptions and informs ideas and personal development.

+  Explore the characteristics and relevance of a range of different media, techniques and approaches.

+  Critically evaluate the potential uses and application of media experiments.

+  Apply a range of media and alternative media combinations to create innovative work that communicates a personal response.

+  Resolve problems and produce solutions through the considered application of research and theoretical knowledge.
